member.name: P:DevExpress.ExpressApp.RichEdit.Win.IModelRichEditFormatSettings.DocumentStorageFormat

summary.para: Specifies the document storage format used by the RichEdit Property Editor.

member.value: An enumeration value specifying the document storage format used by the RichEdit Property Editor.

summary.para: Extends the node with properties specifying the RichEdit editor menu behavior.
The document is stored in the HTML format.
The document is stored in the RTF format.
Contains values specifying the document storage format used by the RichEdit Property Editor.
The editor does not use a menu.
The editor uses the bars menu.
The menu type is selected based on the value.
Contains values specifying the menu type used by the RichEdit Property Editor.

summary.para: Extends the node with properties specifying the RichEdit document storage format.
